title: Kara no Kyoukai 6: Boukyaku Rokuon
synopsis: With strange events occurring at Reien Girls' Academy during winter break, Azaka Kokutou, a student and apprentice mage, is sent by her master to investigate. It turns out that another mage has been stealing the students' memories using fairies that, despite her magical talent, are invisible to Azaka. So Shiki Ryougi, an acquaintance with special eyes who can see what Azaka cannot, is also sent to the academy to help with the crisis.
related_anime: ['Kara no Kyoukai 5: Mujun Rasen', 'Kara no Kyoukai Remix: Gate of Seventh Heaven', 'Kara no Kyoukai: Manner Movies', 'Kara no Kyoukai 7: Satsujin Kousatsu (Go)', 'Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners']
